# ClusterAnnotation

**Class**

An annotation type that groups multiple annotations together.

## Declaration

```swift
class ClusterAnnotation extends MarkerAnnotation
```

## Discussion

The framework creates a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ClusterAnnotation] when it groups annotations in a cluster. You can replace the annotation or update its properties using the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/annotationForCluster] delegate method.

## Instance Properties

- **memberAnnotations**: An array of annotations that the framework grouped together in a cluster.

## Inherits From

- MarkerAnnotation
